summary: This mods adds my standalone follower, Kida, from the Disney movie Atlantis.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/Lj96D6Z.png[/img]﻿
﻿
[img]https://i.imgur.com/L8qGbCd.png[/img][/size]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]
[size=3][i]This is my eighth serious standalone follower.[/i][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84105/]
[/url]
[u]You can add screenshots! I'll be waiting yours.
[/u][/i][i][u][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/8b4cece25815466abda6ca557ba9c853.png[/img]
[/u][/i][/size]
[color=#ff0000]*Note:[/color] English is not my native language, I'll do my best to explain you all about this mod.
[size=6]
► [color=#8e7cc3]INFORMATION [/color]◄[/size]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[size=3]
[/size][size=3]Kida is a warrior princess, making her strong and very skilled at combat. Although she can seem quite forceful, violent, and aggressive at times, she has a kind heart and a general respect for all creatures. Like all Atlanteans, Kida has white hair and brown skin. She has blue-colored tattoos (which represent teardrops) and large blue eyes, though they can change to blind.
[/size]
[i][size=3]This mods adds my standalone follower, Kida, from the Disney movie Atlantis.[/size][/i]
[i][size=3]
Name: Kida
Hair Color: White
Eye Color: Blue/Blind
Essential: Yes
Level: Levels with PC
Combat Style: Assassin (Melee and Ranged)
Inventory list: x1 Ebony Bow, x100 Ebony Arrows, x2 Ebony Daggers
Armor: Daugr Armor
Spells: Conjure Atronachs, Demoras, Familiars and Dragon Priests
Body - UNP

[/size][/i][/font][i][size=3]She can be found inside Dragonsreach (Whiterun), ready to follow you.[/size][/i][font=Trebuchet MS][i][size=3]
[/size][/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/reelO1T.png[/img]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
﻿﻿
﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/epBkPjM.jpg[/img]﻿

[i][size=4]** Dragonsreach (Whiterun) **
[/size][/i]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/aQdbGCp.png[/img]
[size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]
[/size]
[i][i]Kalilies[/i] for the hair.
Bethesda for making this fantastic game.
Disney for the movie Atlantis.[/i]
[i]Nexus Community for making me possible to share this mod.

[size=5]Check out my other mods & screenshots!
